dl.dd: Located just east of St. Peters on Route 4. The entrance to the park is on the east side bridge over the canal.

h4.a: Click here for a park map

html.p: June 17 to Sept. 12 for the 2011 Season

Offers a 56 site wooded hillside campground, comfort station (showers and flush toilets), open picnic area, and unsupervised beach. Walking trails provide a good view of the surroundings and much of the history of the site is described at interpretive sites along the way.
WiFi is available at the admin building only and the surrounding area. There will be a password needed, please see the park receptionists.
